message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to acquire a product of significant value. While I can't disclose specifics at this time, I assure you it's worth well over $1.5 million. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1750000. This is a price point that reflects the product's potential while leaving room for you to make a substantial profit. Consider this your chance to secure a valuable asset. Let me know your thoughts!
